summary: If you desperate enough to see hair in motions for Skyrim then you want to try this.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Add edited meshes for ponytail to match the male head. Male character (non Beast) now can use it.
Add Geralt Hair Style-male to latest update (require Apachii)


[youtube]J3dXod5QidY[/youtube]
[youtube]A5_MpqeJXsQ#t=0[/youtube] [youtube]V-yLpqXa7XY#t=0[/youtube]
[youtube]oS1RzxbM4v8[/youtube] [youtube]WJKqDj4Rw14[/youtube]
[youtube]R0TrN8Jh0R0[/youtube] [youtube]YwklMDS0QRw[/youtube]
*=First

[color=BLUE][size=6]ANIMATED ONE IS HISTORY FOR ME, PHYSIC TO SIMULATE IT IS THE NEW WAY[/size][/color][/center]

[b][color=yellow]INSTALLATION[/color][/b]
Installation
1 .Install SKSE. It is required!
2. Open this directory: Skyrim/data/SKSE/plugins/
3. Search from internet for hdtPhysicsExtensions.dll or "HDT Physics Extension by HydrogensaysHDT" > Download it.
or if you dont want to use google you can download it at [url=http://hdt.monsto.com/]http://hdt.monsto.com/[/url]
4. Copy hdtPhysicsExtensions.dll to the open folder.
5. Install this Mod

[b][color=yellow]HOW TO SEE IT INGAME[/color][/b]
1. Load a female character (never test on beast but it works with custom races)
2. Choose the hair that is not static
3. That's it, ENJOY


[b][color=yellow]NEXT PLAN:[/color][/b]
----

[b][color=yellow]HOW ACTUALLY THIS MOD IS MADE[/color][/b]
watch this video tutorial by Canderes. Awesome one for him and not gonna make this far without him
[youtube]nuiUEvwf6Sg[/youtube]


CREDITS:
Azarkiowa for the hair meshes
Apachii for the hair meshes
TheFidgment for hkxcmd
HidrogenSayHDT for being genius to make the Physics extension plugin
Canderes for the Tutorial
Monsto for the full support to HDT plugin at external site
HelloSanta
Pls tell me If you want to add your name here, I still human that forgot and make mistake

Software:
=========
Havok Content tools 2013.1
3DSMax 2012
Nifskope
Niftools plugin for 3dsMAX
The Conformulator
GIMP plus DDS plugin
Notepad++

Blender? not going to happen LOL
